name: promise-window
description: Lightweight wrapper around window.open() that adds Promise and postMessage support
author: Alex Mercier <pro.alexandre.mercier@gmail.com> (http://amercier.com/)

scripts.openssl: [ -e cert.pem ] || openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -keyout key.pem -out cert.pem -days 365 -nodes -subj '/C=EX/ST=Example/L=Example/O=Example/OU=IT Department/CN=example.com'
scripts.list: find tests -maxdepth 1 -type f -name *.html | while read f; do basename "$f" .html; done | sed 's/^test-//'
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run clean && for suite in $([ "$KARMA_ENV" = "" ] && npm run -s list || echo $KARMA_ENV); do KARMA_ENV=$suite CI=true npm run tdd || exit 1; done && npm run report
scripts.docs: (cd docs && bower install --production) && jsduck src/ --output docs/api --warnings-exit-nonzero
